name: Accuracy
description: Describes a player’s accuracy with ranged weapons such as bows and firearms.

name: Defense
description: Skill at defensive maneuvers and tactics, in particular armor and shields.

name: Folklore
description: Measures knowledge gained from listening to locals and engaging in conversation with diverse sorts of individuals. In addition to local geography and history, includes knowledge of myths, mythical beings, and religion.

name: Legerdemain
description: Used when lockpicking and pickpocketing items, or other such tricks.

name: Literacy
description: Measures knowledge that would usually be obtained via formal education or reading books, such as philosophy, mathematics, economics, or history. Deficiency in this skill normally indicates that the character is illiterate.

name: Martial Arts
description: Describes skill in armed and unarmed combat. Proficiency bonuses in this area are required to use certain melee weapons effectively. Normally, either strength or dexterity can be used interchangeably as the base attribute.

name: Medicine
description: Measures knowledge of disease and wound treatment.

name: Mobility
description: The ability to climb, mantle, vault, and otherwise navigate past obstacles.

name: Nature
description: Measures background knowledge that would usually be obtained by spending time in nature or around animals. Used when casting nature spells.

name: Performance
description: Captures a player's ability to sing, dance, play instruments, or otherwise entertain a crowd. Proficiency with this skill implies the ability to play at least one musical instrument.

name: Persuasion
description: Used when engaging in factual debate, intimidation, or deception. Strength becomes the base attribute only when making a threat of physical force.

name: Perception
description: The ability to discern more than is immediately obvious. When attempting to perceive a character’s honesty or motives, charisma becomes the base stat.

name: Sorcery
description: Practical knowledge of magic, including the speedy recall and correct execution of verbal and somatic spell components.

name: Stealth
description: Used when sneaking or attempting to perform actions without being seen. Speed cannot be used if the noise of sprinting would arouse excessive suspicion.

name: Survival
description: Measures general survival skills, including the ability to recognize threats, build shelter, and live off the land. Used when attempting to recognize monsters at the start of combat.
